properties.description: Wrangles data coming from our Azure Blob Storage.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		item as string,
		link as string,
		guid as string,
		type as string,
		id as string,
		sponsored as string,
		title as string,
		description as string,
		pubDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> GrabFromBlobStorage
GrabFromBlobStorage select(mapColumn(
		item,
		link,
		guid,
		type,
		id,
		sponsored,
		title,
		description,
		publication_date = pubDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveItemColumn
RemoveItemColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WriteToCleanedJsonFile
